red/pellet/powder/cinnabar

surname Jiang
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Danjiangkou county level city in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei

sentences.english: The water on the middle route is supposed to flow from the Danjiangkou Reservoir in Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 中線引水計劃從湖北省的丹江口水庫流出。

sentences.english: Another would bring water from the Three Gorges reservoir to the Danjiangkou reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面要把三峽大壩的水帶入丹江口水庫。

sentences.english: The Danjiangkou reservoir is the water source area of the middle route project of S-N water transfer.
sentences.chinese: 丹江口水庫爲南水北調中線工程水源地。

sentences.english: In the Danjiangkou Reservoir area, eutrophication is the major pollution.
sentences.chinese: 富營養化是丹江口水庫污染治理的重點。

sentences.english: Xichuan the Danjiangkou Reservoir is the source of North Water Transfer Project.
sentences.chinese: 淅川的丹江口水庫是南水北調中線工程的源頭。

sentences.english: Situated in Danjiangkou, northwest Hubei, Mount Wudang is one of the famous mountains in China.
sentences.chinese: 武當山位於丹江口，西北的湖北，是我國的名山之一。

sentences.english: Danjiangkou Reservoir is the largest artificial lake in Asian.
sentences.chinese: 丹江口水庫是亞洲最大的人工湖。

sentences.english: The enhanced Danjiangkou Dam is the water-source project of the mid-route of South-North Water Transfer Project.
sentences.chinese: 加高後的丹江口大壩爲南水北調中線水源工程。

sentences.english: The scene of flood discharge at Danjiangkou dam, central China's Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北丹江口大壩開閘泄洪的場景。
